item.content:

item.title: Virtual Devices
item.description: Introduction Virtual Device is a great way to connect to your devices before your actual device is ready // JS code const myDeviceTrait = getMyDeviceTrait(); const myDevice = CreateDevice(myDeviceTrait); myDevice.action1(); const myDeviceState = myDevice.getCurrentState();
item.content:
Introduction

Virtual Device is a great way to connect to your devices before your actual device is ready

// JS code
const myDeviceTrait = getMyDeviceTrait();
const myDevice = CreateDevice(myDeviceTrait);
myDevice.action1();
const myDeviceState = myDevice.getCurrentState();

item.title: YoDP
item.description: Introduction Welcome to Yonomi Developer Poral. We provide integration solution to developers around the world to connect to various devices. Some of the things that you can do in this portal are the following Provision your devices with the platform Obtain oauth tokens to connect to the platform Create virtual devices so that you can start integrate your device even before the prototype is ready
item.content:
Introduction

Welcome to Yonomi Developer Poral. We provide integration solution to developers around the world to connect to various devices. Some of the things that you can do in this portal are the following

  • Provision your devices with the platform
  • Obtain oauth tokens to connect to the platform
  • Create virtual devices so that you can start integrate your device even before the prototype is ready
